definition.text: Delegation Power is the Token Power that goes into the Delegation Program, and determines how much power you are ready to delegate.

translations.text: Delegation Power ("Делегированная сила") - это Token Power, которая входит в программу делегирования ( Delegation Program) и определяет, сколько полномочий вы готовы делегировать.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
